response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. I have a unique product that I believe could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. Before we proceed, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. If you are interested, I am willing to sell this exceptional item to you for $750,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while also allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of the investment I've made into this product. I trust that its value to you will far exceed this amount, making it a wise financial decision. Please let me know if you wish to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 750000}
